title: PhET Interactive Simulations in English
description:
Physics and Math Interactive Simulations for young students.

PhET is a project of the University of Colorado Boulder, founded in 2002 by Nobel Laureate Carl Wieman, to improve the way science is taught and learned worldwide, through free interactive simulations.
